Jonathan is an author, entrepreneur, professional speaker, innovation specialist and ambassador for Enterprise UK

NEW: Jonathan has launched his third business, fflap.com. fflap is a collection of the very best tools and services to help you make more profits and make them faster using social networks as a platform for eBay business success.

Jonathan founded Santeau in his back bedroom and sold the business 4 years later. Through dogged tenacity and unshakable self-belief, Jon has appeared in the national press and intentional radio on countless occasions, once having his top ten tips for business success compared to those of business mogul and chairman of TV show The Apprentice, Sir Alan Sugar.

An accomplished athlete, Jonathan was keen to discover a way of keeping properly hydrated. In training for a gruelling marathon across the Sahara Desert, he was struck with the idea for WAHOO. Jonathan invented a product that when added to refilled water bottles would become an award-winning healthy alternative to fizzy, sugary soft drinks on the go sold through UK retailers and the Military.

Jonathan has motivated many entrepreneurs into action with his seminars and professional speaking appearances. Using proven techniques and expertise, he shows people how and when to make the necessary adjustments to achieve their goals, and how to capture and control inspiration, dedication and motivation.

Jonathan is 40 and lives in Harrogate, North Yorkshire with his wife Lisa and their three boys, Harry, Fred & Patrick.

Jonathan is an Ambassador for Enterprise UK, The national campaign to give people in the UK the confidence, skills and ambition to be enterprising - to have ideas and make them happen. www.enterpriseuk.org
